data.text:
Tür: #shortfilm

Link: https://www.tiptuber.org/movie/short-film/sci-fi-short-film-the-black-hole-dust/?feed_id=1557&_unique_id=651b72f740543

If you could move through any solid object, what would you do?

“The Black Hole” by Phil & Olly

Subscribe to the DUST Newsletter: https://bit.ly/signal_newsletter

#DUST #scifi #shortfilm

More About The Black Hole:

An office drone (Napoleon Ryan) finds a mysterious piece of paper that allows him to pass through solid objects, so he takes advantage of this new power.

About DUST:

DUST presents thought-provoking science fiction content, exploring the future of humanity through the lens of science and technology. From timeless classics to cutting-edge movies, series, short films, and podcasts, DUST acquires, produces and distributes all content types.
